description: This source file provides utility APIs for Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) implementation, including initializing key generation parameters from certificates and private key info, as well as generating private key encoding. The functions handle key pair validation, extraction, and encoding handling for cryptographic operations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PKIUtilityInitKeyGenParams(ANSC_HANDLE hSSLCrypto,PANSC_ASN1_CERTIFICATE pCert,PANSC_ASN1_PRIVATEKEYINFO pKeyInfo,ANSC_HANDLE hKeyGenParams)
methods.description: Initializes key generation parameters based on provided certificate and private key info, verifying key consistency and matching key pairs.

methods.name: PUCHAR PKIUtilityGetPrivateKeyInfoEncoding(ANSC_HANDLE hKeyGenParams,PKI_KEY_TYPE keyType,PULONG pLength)
methods.description: Generates ASN.1 encoded private key information from key generation parameters and key type.
